cards.title: TCS Systech Partner Serialization Solutions Life Sciences
cards.description: Systech International announces its partnership with TCS to supply the life sciences industry with an effective and economic means of implementing their serialization programs.

image.alt: TCS Systech Partner Serialization Solutions Life Sciences

cards.title: TCS Efficient Cloud Operations with AWS cloud Solutions
cards.description: Power up your enterprise cloud journey and run a seamless cloud operations framework with TCS' AI-enabled cloud operations platform. Explore now.

image.alt: TCS Efficient Cloud Operations with AWS cloud Solutions

cards.title: TCS interactive Life Sciences on MM&M Top 100 List
cards.description: Every year MM&M magazine ranks the top 100 pharmaceutical marketing companies by revenue. TCS interactive Life Sciences is honored to be named to that list.

image.alt: TCS interactive Life Sciences on MM&M Top 100 List

cards.title: The TCS Recipe for Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Success
cards.description: In a recent interview with Inside HR, Deborah Hadwen, CEO, TCS ANZ, discusses TCS' CSR approach, strategies and success in Australia

cards.title: Everest group names TCS a leader in healthcare analytics service

cards.title: TCS And GE Partner to Enable Healthcare Industry Transformation
